availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Clarkston. Father of John Clarkston, James Clarkston, Mary Clarkston, Samuel Clarkston, Thomas Clarkston, Alexander Clarkston, Squire Clarkston, and Filmore Clarkston. Farmer in Harlan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Perry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harlan County, District 1, p. 16A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, District 1, p. 762.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, Maggard, p. 577A.
